branchCategory.name: FGE, Medium Flow Rate, Bolt Tightening Type , Industrial Filter, Vessel Series
branchCategory.description: <p>Suitable for medium flow rate and low pressure filtration, the FGE industrial filter series can be used with a wide range of fluids.  The FGE is available in two styles, a V-band type and a bolt tightening type.  Element replacement is easy with the FGES and FGEL V-band types.</p>

breadCrumb.name: FGE, Medium Flow Rate, Bolt Tightening Type , Industrial Filter, Vessel Series
